----Generated by ChatGPT----

project/
│
├── app/                        # Core business logic
│   ├── ingestion/             # OCR + SQLite + Embedding
│   │   ├── watcher.py         # Folder watcher and image handler
│   │   ├── ocr.py             # OCR engine using Tesseract
│   │   ├── storage.py         # SQLite storage helpers
│   │   └── embedder.py        # Sentence transformer embedding
│   │
│   ├── indexing/             # FAISS operations
│   │   ├── index.py           # Index add/query/save/load
│   │   └── id_map.py          # ID map load/save
│   │
│   ├── retrieval/            # RAG and query answering
│   │   └── retriever.py       # Uses FAISS + LLaMA chat completion
│   │
│   ├── utils/                # General helpers
│   │   ├── logger.py          # Log setup
│   │   └── hashing.py         # File hashing
│   │
│   └── config.py              # Global paths and settings
│
├── data/                      # Local storage
│   ├── db/                   # SQLite database
│   ├── index/                # FAISS index and ID map
│   └── watch/                # Folder watched for new images
│
├── logs/                      # Log files directory
│   └── system.log
│
├── models/                    # Local fine-tuned models (if any)
│
├── scripts/                   # Entry points
│   ├── run_parser.py         # Starts OCR + ingestion service
│   └── query_console.py      # Terminal-based Q&A chat
│
├── requirements.txt           # Python deps
└── README.md                  # Project guide
